back_text:
困難 / 專家
[skull]：-2 (-4 instead if there are 6 or fewer locations remaining in the Road deck).
[cultist]：-2. 你檢定失敗且每低於難度1點，an investigator in your vehicle places 1 of their clues on your location.
[tablet]：-3. 你檢定失敗且每低於難度1點，an investigator in your vehicle loses 1 resource.
[elder_thing]：-4. Resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play.
name: Horror in High Gear
text:
簡單 / 普通
[skull]：-1 (-3 instead if there are 6 or fewer locations remaining in the Road deck).
[cultist]：-1. 你檢定失敗且每低於難度1點，an investigator in your vehicle places 1 of their clues on your location.
[tablet]：-2. 你檢定失敗且每低於難度1點，an investigator in your vehicle loses 1 resource.
[elder_thing]：-4. 如果你檢定失敗, resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play.

flavor: On your way to Falcon Point, you are ambushed by agents of the Order!
name: The Chase is On! (v. I)
text: As an additional cost for you to move while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. 強制 - 當一輪結束時：Starting with the rearmost location, set each location with no vehicles, enemies, or investigators aside, out of play (or add it to the victory display if it has 勝利X and has no clues on it)。Stop when you reach a location with at least 1 vehicle, enemy, or investigator; or the location behind the rearmost investigator.

name: The Terror of Devil Reef
text: 生成 - Rearmost location. 獵手。龐大。反擊。 強制 - When The Terror of Devil Reef would be defeated: Instead, remove all damage from it and exhaust it. It cannot ready for the remainder of the round.

back_flavor: Just as you think you might be able to escape unscathed, you hear the telltale sputtering of your engine struggling to keep up with your demands. You curse and briefly stop your car before it stalls. You have only seconds to get it started again before the cultists catch up to you!
back_text:
Flip over each vehicle that is running, so that it is stopped.
將遭遇棄牌堆混洗入遭遇牌堆。 If there are 3 or 4 investigators in the game, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[載具]]敵人 or 機械故障 treachery is discarded. The lead investigator draws that card.
flavor: On your way to Falcon Point, you are ambushed by agents of the Order!
name: The Chase is On! (v. II)
text: As an additional cost for you to move while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. 強制 - 當一輪結束時：Starting with the rearmost location, set each location with no vehicles, enemies, or investigators aside, out of play (or add it to the victory display if it has 勝利X and has no clues on it)。Stop when you reach a location with at least 1 vehicle, enemy, or investigator; or the location behind the rearmost investigator.

back_flavor:
Day is starting to break through the trees to the east, and thanks to the interference of your relentless pursuers, you still haven't made it to Falcon Point. Your car has begun to shake and stutter. You know it is only a matter of minutes before it runs out of fuel, but you have no choice. They've almost caught up to you. You force the accelerator down - 
The turn catches you by surprise. You try to skid to a halt, but it's too late. There is a brief feeling of weightlessness as the wheels leave the ground. Time slows to a crawl. 然後，a whirlwind of chaos erupts around you.
The next thing you know, you are crawling out of the wreckage. You are bloody and bruised, but alive. And by some twist of fortune, your pursuers have driven past the spot of your accident. "Next time, I'm driving," Agent Harper jokes between fits of coughing.
back_text: 每位調查員 is defeated and suffers 1 physical trauma.
flavor: The Order is out for blood!
name: Hot Pursuit
text: As an additional cost for you to move while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. 強制 - 當一輪結束時：Starting with the rearmost location, set each location with no vehicles, enemies, or investigators aside, out of play (or add it to the victory display if it has 勝利X and has no clues on it)。Stop when you reach a location with at least 1 vehicle, enemy, or investigator; or the location behind the rearmost investigator.

back_flavor:
"I think we've lost them!" Agent Harper shouts, peeking her head out of your car's window. You glance at your rearview mirror and confirm that you no longer see the glaring headlights of your pursuers. Warm relief flutters through you. It's finally over.
For now.
flavor: Your only chance is to reach Falcon Point before your pursuers catch up to you.
name: Pedal to the Metal
text: Each enemy gains 獵手。 強制 - At the end of each investigation phase: Each vehicle that is running must move to a connecting [[Road]]地點 of the driver's choice. 目標 - Drive to Falcon Point as fast as you can! (You will be instructed when to advance.)

back_flavor: "On the left the creek-threaded countryside was nearer, the narrow road to Ipswich gleaming white in the moonlight." – H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特，《印斯茅斯之影》
flavor: The road continues to wind up the side of the cliff. The lighthouse beacon at the peak shines through the fog, luring you closer.
name: Falcon Point Approach
text: 目標 - If each undefeated investigator is at Falcon Point Approach, 推進場景。

back_flavor: "On the left the creek-threaded countryside was nearer, the narrow road to Ipswich gleaming white in the moonlight." – H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特，《印斯茅斯之影》
name: Dimly Lit Road
text: Road 1. 強制 - When a vehicle leaves this location: Investigators at this location, as a group, must spend 1 clue for 每位調查員 in that 載具. For each clue they could not spend, an investigator in that vehicle 受到2點恐懼。 (Limit once per game for each 載具.)

back_flavor: "On the left the creek-threaded countryside was nearer, the narrow road to Ipswich gleaming white in the moonlight." – H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特，《印斯茅斯之影》
name: Dimly Lit Road
text: Road 1. 強制 - When a vehicle leaves this location: Investigators at this location, as a group, must spend 2 clues for 每位調查員 in that 載具. For each clue they could not spend, an investigator in that vehicle 受到1點恐懼。 (Limit once per game for each 載具.)

name: Cliffside Road
text: Road 1. 強制 - When a vehicle leaves this location: Investigators at this location, as a group, must spend 2 clues for 每位調查員 in that 載具. If they cannot, the vehicle's driver tests [willpower](X)或[agility](X)，其中X為the number of clues they could not spend. If the driver fails, their vehicle is removed from the game and 每位調查員 in that vehicle takes 10 damage. (Limit once per game for each 載具.)

name: Long Way Around
text: Road 1. 強制 - After a vehicle enters Long Way Around: 放置1個毀滅標記 on the current agenda (this may cause the current agenda to advance)。That vehicle cannot leave Long Way Around until the end of the next round.

name: 托馬斯·道森's Car
text:
載具. Limit 2 investigators in this 載具.
This vehicle is running. Investigators cannot enter or leave it.
[action] If you are this vehicle's driver: 抽取遭遇牌堆頂的卡牌. 然後，move this vehicle to a connecting [[Road]]地點. (Max once per round.)
[action] If you are this vehicle's driver: You stop the car. Flip this vehicle over.

name: 托馬斯·道森's Car
text:
載具. Limit 2 investigators in this 載具.
This vehicle is stopped.
[action] If you are this vehicle's driver: You start the car. Flip this vehicle over.

name: 艾蓮娜·哈珀's Car
text:
載具. Limit 2 investigators in this 載具.
This vehicle is running. Investigators cannot enter or leave it.
[action] If you are this vehicle's driver: 抽取遭遇牌堆頂的卡牌. 然後，move this vehicle to a connecting [[Road]]地點. (Max once per round.)
[action] If you are this vehicle's driver: You stop the car. Flip this vehicle over.

text:
載具. Limit 2 investigators in this 載具.
This vehicle is stopped.
[action] If you are this vehicle's driver: You start the car. Flip this vehicle over.

name: Pursuing Motorcar
text: 生成 - Rearmost location. 獵手。 強制 - When Pursuing Motorcar attacks you, if you are not in a vehicle: It deals +2 damage for this attack. 強制 - When Pursuing Motorcar attacks an investigator in a vehicle: It attacks each other investigator in that vehicle, as well.
traits: 載具. 類人. 異教徒

name: Hit Van
text: 生成 - Rearmost location. 獵手。反擊。 Hit Van cannot attack during the same phase it moved via its hunter keyword.
traits: 載具. 類人. 異教徒

name: Hybrid Assassin
text: 獵手。 強制 - After Hybrid Assassin moves via its hunter keyword, if it is unengaged: Resolve its hunter keyword again. (每輪限制一次)。
traits: 載具. 類人. 混血

name: Bumpy Ride
text: 顯現 - If you are... - ...not in a vehicle, 檢定[agility](5)。如果你檢定失敗，受到3點傷害。 - ...in a vehicle, that vehicle's driver tests [agility](3)。If the driver fails, 每位調查員 in your vehicle 受到2點傷害。

name: "I can't see!"
text: 顯現 - If you are... - ...not in a vehicle, 檢定[willpower](5)。如果你檢定失敗，受到3點恐懼。 - ...in a vehicle, that vehicle's driver tests [willpower](3)。If the driver fails, 每位調查員 in your vehicle 受到2點恐懼。

name: Eyes in the Trees
text: 顯現 - 檢定[willpower](4)。如果你檢定失敗, you must either discard an asset you control, or 丟棄你1張手牌 for each point you failed by. 如果你檢定失敗 and you are in a vehicle, each other investigator in your vehicle must also resolve this effect as if they had just failed.

name: "They're catching up!"
text: 顯現 - Resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play. If no enemies move as a result of this effect, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[載具]]敵人 is discarded and spawn that enemy at the rearmost location.
